availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Carter Blanton Snell (Grant County, Kentucky, physician)

body.p: Grant County, Kentucky, physician. Kentucky native. Married to Adelaide Blanton Snell in Owen County, Kentucky, on October 20, 1844. Father of Mary Snell, Blanton Snell, Ellen Snell, Sarah L. Snell, Chester Snell, Davis Snell, Prentice Snell, Carter Snell, and Susan Snell. Physician in Williamstown, Kentucky, in 1850. Physician in Williamstown in 1860. Owned two enslaved persons in Grant County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
